name: Keith Webster
body:
Hello there! While this page is under construction, it's primary focus will be on providing samples of my works. I specialize in C++, C#, and Unreal Engine 4's Blueprint scripting system. If the images are too small you can view them in their original album which is located [_here_](http://imgur.com/a/of6yk)

Additionally, a trailer to my first UE4 project can be found [_here_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QlmDCas__mA) ### Blueprint Samples

Generating abilities for a base character class in a pvp game.

Basic projectile/player collision in multiplayer game with debugging.

Modifying cooldown of a character ability to display based on character status.

Character basic attack and ability activation over server as well as categorization of functions and macros.

### C# Samples

Portions of example project I provided students with that they should be able to replicate upon completion of courses I am assigned to.

### C++ Samples

A* pathfinding algorithm map generation

A* pathfinding implementation

Frustum building

Recursive AI for Reversi game

### Contact Information

Check out my [LinkedIn](www.linkedin.com/in/kwebster792) page to see past projects as well as employment history and skillset.

Email: KWebster792@outlook.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
